text: Epic Systems is requiring its 9,000-plus employees to return to work in person at its sprawling campus outside of Madison, Wisconsin. It's one of the first large employers in the state to no longer give employees the choice of working from home. https://t.co/LTmdrC4GWv

name: chicagotribune
text: Community leaders gathered outside Mather High School on Tuesday afternoon to remember slain activist Caleb Reed: “He was adamant, he was consistent and he wasn’t going to give up”  https://t.co/AkZtkpz6Zz

name: chicagotribune
text:
The story of Monty and Rose and their plover chicks on Montrose Beach is just a snapshot of life for endangered species.

“People can come away with a little appreciation of just how difficult it is in this world for some of these species to survive.” https://t.co/Uud4inYK8S

text: ”Going to college is life-changing. We want to support that. We support families moving towards economic self-sufficiency, and so getting their education is a really critical element of making a change in their life and the lives of their families.” https://t.co/Wsq8Hx4imV
